data.title: Laura Lee – Age, Net worth, Ethnicity, Married, Husband, Family
data.meta_description: Laura Lee is a popular American YouTuber and beauty blogger. Posting videos of her makeup routines to Instagram, Lee has morphed into a beauty influencer
data.text:
Laura Lee is a popular American YouTuber and beauty blogger. Posting videos of her makeup routines to Instagram, Lee has morphed into a beauty influencer and YouTube powerhouse. She has millions of followers on social media and her own makeup brand. However, her successful brand has recently taken a hit due to some controversial tweets she made in the past. Find out more about Lee including her ethnicity, net worth, husband and family here.

Laura Lee’s Age and Ethnicity

Laura Ann Lee was born on September 1, 1988 in Montgomery, Alabama. She is American by nationality and European by ethnicity. Before becoming a beauty fanatic and influential beauty blogger, Laura Lee worked in a variety of jobs, including preschool teacher and medical assistant to a dermatologist.

Lee’s journey into the beauty industry was actually inspired by her medical assistant work. She had always been a makeup enthusiast, but the environment she worked in required her to tone down her makeup. Since she couldn’t wear much makeup in the office, she put on the makeup at home and shared the video on Instagram. She got so much love and positive reaction and soon her passion turned into a full time job.

She launched her first YouTube channel in June 2009. The channel offers makeup tutorials, product reviews, life hacks, etc. It has reached at least five million subscribers and over 450 million views.

your fortune

Lee has grown from a beauty influencer to an entrepreneur. She now has her own makeup brand called Laura Lee Los Angeles. The brand offers products such as eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks, highlighters and eyeliners. The Alabama native has also collaborated with other cosmetic brands such as MAC Cosmetics and Benefit Cosmetics.
